def is_dvd_player_operational(dvd_player: item):
    # Check if the DVD player is plugged in and has a switch
    return plugged(dvd_player) and has_switch(dvd_player)

behavior ensure_dvd_player_is_operational(dvd_player: item):
    body:
        if not is_dvd_player_operational(dvd_player):
            # If the DVD player is not operational, inspect its state
            observe(dvd_player, "Check if the DVD player is plugged and has a switch")
            if not plugged(dvd_player):
                # Make sure the DVD player is plugged if it is unplugged
                achieve plugged(dvd_player)
        
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        ensure_dvd_player_is_operational(dvd_player)

        # Approach the remote control

        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        # Temporarily hold the remote control to operate it

        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Turn on the DVD player using the remote control

        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and close_char(char, remote_control)
        # Select the remote control that is close to the character

        # Use the remote control to turn on the DVD player

behavior press_power_button(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    # Define a behavior to use the remote control to turn on the DVD player
    body:
        achieve facing(remote_control, dvd_player)
        # Ensure the remote control is facing the DVD player
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Turn on the DVD player using the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and inhand(remote_control)
        # Bind the remote control that is currently in hand
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Bind the DVD player

        press_power_button(remote_control, dvd_player)
        # Use the remote control to turn on the DVD player

def is_dvd_player_off(dvd_player:item):

    symbol dvd_player_off=is_off(dvd_player)
    return dvd_player_off

behavior turn_on_dvd_player_with_remote(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) # Use the remote to turn on the DVD player

        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and inhand(remote_control)
        # Select the remote control that is already in hand

        bind dvd_player: item where:
